title: Customized Biology Textbook Improvement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biological theories and understanding of job-related technical terminology
context.additional_context: Job-integrated, learner-centered design utilizing smartphone-based digital textbooks.

learning_goals: Learners can create customized content by applying VR simulations to biology textbooks.
Learners can explain biological knowledge required for the work environment with over 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of textbook content improved through peer assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
